title: Water Fight!
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 50 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 160L
description: Jacob got soaked with a water balloon! William got soaked with a bucket! Who will get soaked next? Water Fight! is an entertaining story about a group of friends and their summertime fun. Vibrant illustrations, simple sentences, and high-frequency words support early emergent readers. Students will have the opportunity to connect to prior knowledge as well as to identify the main idea and supporting details.
meta: bucket, noodle, soaked, sponge, squirt gun, water balloon
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Initial Sound : Discriminate initial consonant /b/ sound
High-Frequency Words : High frequency words a, by, and with

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
